name: talkitecture
description: Personifying historical landmarks, helping you learn about their stories. Built for Hack@Brown 2026.

scripts.dev: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:client
scripts.dev:server: cd apps/server && source .venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=. uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:server:ssl: cd apps/server && source .venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=. uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --ssl-keyfile ../client/localhost-key.pem --ssl-certfile ../client/localhost.pem
scripts.dev:ssl: npm run dev:server:ssl & npm run dev:client:ssl
